Annotation.Note:
Channel 1 output buffer enable.
Disable: Buffer function of TMRx_C1DT is disabled. The new value written to the TMRx_C1DT takes effect immediately.
Enable: Buffer function of TMRx_C1DT is enabled. The value to be written to the TMRx_C1DT is stored in the buffer register, and can be sent to the TMRx_C1DT register only on an overflow event.
Annotation.NoteCH:
通道1输出缓存使能（Channel 1 output buffer enable）
关闭：关闭TMRx_C1DT的缓存功能，写入TMRx_C1DT的内容会立即生效。
开启：启用TMRx_C1DT的缓存功能，写入TMRx_C1DT的内容将保存到缓存寄存器中，当发生溢出事件时再更新到TMRx_C1DT中。

Annotation.Note:
Channel 2 output buffer enable.
Disable: Buffer function of TMRx_C2DT is disabled. The new value written to the TMRx_C2DT takes effect immediately.
Enable: Buffer function of TMRx_C2DT is enabled. The value to be written to the TMRx_C2DT is stored in the buffer register, and can be sent to the TMRx_C2DT register only on an overflow event.
Annotation.NoteCH:
通道2输出缓存使能（Channel 2 output buffer enable）
关闭：关闭TMRx_C2DT的缓存功能，写入TMRx_C2DT的内容会立即生效。
开启：启用TMRx_C2DT的缓存功能，写入TMRx_C2DT的内容将保存到缓存寄存器中，当发生溢出事件时再更新到TMRx_C2DT中。

Annotation.Note:
Channel 3 output buffer enable.
Disable: Buffer function of TMRx_C3DT is disabled. The new value written to the TMRx_C3DT takes effect immediately.
Enable: Buffer function of TMRx_C3DT is enabled. The value to be written to the TMRx_C3DT is stored in the buffer register, and can be sent to the TMRx_C3DT register only on an overflow event.
Annotation.NoteCH:
通道3输出缓存使能（Channel 3 output buffer enable）
关闭：关闭TMRx_C3DT的缓存功能，写入TMRx_C3DT的内容会立即生效。
开启：启用TMRx_C3DT的缓存功能，写入TMRx_C3DT的内容将保存到缓存寄存器中，当发生溢出事件时再更新到TMRx_C3DT中。

Annotation.Note:
Channel 4 output buffer enable.
Disable: Buffer function of TMRx_C4DT is disabled. The new value written to the TMRx_C4DT takes effect immediately.
Enable: Buffer function of TMRx_C4DT is enabled. The value to be written to the TMRx_C4DT is stored in the buffer register, and can be sent to the TMRx_C4DT register only on an overflow event.
Annotation.NoteCH:
通道4输出缓存使能（Channel 4 output buffer enable）
关闭：关闭TMRx_C4DT的缓存功能，写入TMRx_C4DT的内容会立即生效。
开启：启用TMRx_C4DT的缓存功能，写入TMRx_C4DT的内容将保存到缓存寄存器中，当发生溢出事件时再更新到TMRx_C4DT中。

Condition.Diagnostic: This TMR already used for "Timebase Source" in SYSTEM
Condition.DiagnosticCH: 此TMR已经被用于SYSTEM中"时基源"

Condition.Diagnostic:
(1) Need to select "Activated"
(2) Not valid while a "Multi-Channels" is active
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
(1) 需要选择 "启用"
(2) 当设置了"通道组合"时无效

Condition.Diagnostic: Channel1 is already used as input for the "Subordinate mode" controller
Condition.DiagnosticCH: 通道1已经被用于"次定时器模式"的输入

Condition.Diagnostic: Channel2 must be in "Input direct mode" to activate this mode
Condition.DiagnosticCH: 通道2设置为"直接输入模式"时，此项有效

Condition.Diagnostic: An "ISx" or "C1INC" must be selected as "Sub-mode input selection"
Condition.DiagnosticCH: "次定时器模式输入选项"需设置为"内部选择x"或者"C1IRAW的输入检测器(C1INC)"

Condition.Diagnostic:
(1) Channel1 cannot be used in output while the "Sub-mode input selection" is in "C1INC" or "C1IFP1"
(2) Mode not compatible with "Enalbe XOR"
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
(1) "次定时器模式输入选项" 设置为 "C1IRAW的输入检测器(C1INC)" 或者 "滤波输入1"时，通道1不能用于输出
(2) 此模式与"开启异或功能"不兼容

Condition.Diagnostic:
(1) Channel1 cannot be used in output while the "Sub-mode input selection" is in "C1INC" or "C1IFP1"
(2) Mode not compatible with "Enalbe XOR"

Condition.DiagnosticCH:
(1) 需要选择 "启用"
(2) "异或 / HALL 模式"时，通道3无法使用

Condition.DiagnosticCH: 通道4设置为"直接输入模式"时，此项有效

Condition.DiagnosticCH: 需要选择 "启用"

Condition.DiagnosticCH: 通道3设置为"直接输入模式"时，此项有效

Condition.Diagnostic:
(1) Need to select "Activated"
(2) Channel 1 and 2 must not be activated
(3) "Subordinate mode"must not be activated
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
(1) 需要选择 "启用"
(2) 需通道1和2未被使用
(3) 需"次定时器模式"未使用

Condition.Diagnostic:
This option might become unavailable if
(1) Channel 1 or Channel 2 is already used as input for the "Subordinate mode" controller
(2) The "Clock selection" is in "External clock mode B"
(3) "Enalbe XOR" is activated
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
此选项以下情况无效：
(1) 通道1或者通道2已经被用于"次定时器模式"的输入
(2) "时钟选择" 设置了 "外部时钟模式B"
(3) "开启异或功能"被开启

Condition.Diagnostic: This option might become unavailable if the "Enalbe XOR" is activated
Condition.DiagnosticCH: "开启异或功能"被开启时，此项无效

Condition.Diagnostic: This option might become unavailable if the "Enalbe XOR" is activated
Condition.DiagnosticCH: "开启异或功能"被开启时，此项无效

Condition.Diagnostic:
This option might become unavailable if
(1) Channel 1 , 2 or 3 is already activated
(2) Channel 1 or Channel 2 is already used as input for the "Subordinate mode" controller
(3) "Enalbe XOR" is activated
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
此选项以下情况无效：
(1) 通道1或者通道2或者通道3已被开启
(2) 通道1或者通道2已经被用于"次定时器模式"的输入
(3) "开启异或功能"被开启

Condition.Diagnostic:
(1) Need to select "Activated"
(2) Not valid while a "Multi-Channels" is active
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
(1) 需要选择 "启用"
(2) 当设置了"通道组合"时无效

Condition.Diagnostic: "C1INC" can not be used in "Hang Mode"
Condition.DiagnosticCH: "C1IRAW的输入检测器(C1INC)"不能用于"挂起模式"

Mode.Name: Sub-mode input selection
Mode.UserNameCH: 次定时器模式输入选择

Condition.Diagnostic:
(1) Need to select "Activated"
(2) Not valid while a "Multi-Channels" is active
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
(1) 需要选择 "启用"
(2) 当设置了"通道组合"时无效

Condition.Diagnostic:
An active "Subordinate mode" should be selected first . This option might become unavailable if
(1) EXT is already used for "Enale EXT pin for output switch"
(2) EXT is already used as a "Clock selection"
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
需选择一项"次定时器模式" . 此选项以下情况无效：
(1) EXT已经用于"开启外部输入引脚用于输出开关"
(2) EXT已经用于"时钟选择"

Condition.Diagnostic:
This option is not available if
(1) Channel 1 is already set as output mode
(2) The "Subordinate mode" controller is in "Hang mode"
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
此选项以下情况无效：
(1) 通道1设置为输出模式
(2) "次定时器模式"设置为"挂起模式"

Condition.Diagnostic:
An active "Subordinate mode" should be selected first . This option might become unavailable if
(1) Channel 1 is already set as output mode
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
需选择一项"次定时器模式" . 此选项以下情况无效：
(1) 通道1设置了输出模式

Condition.Diagnostic:
An active "Subordinate mode" should be selected first . This option might become unavailable if
(1) Channel 2 is already set as output mode
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
需选择一项"次定时器模式" . 此选项以下情况无效：
(1) 通道2设置了输出模式

Condition.Diagnostic:
Need to select "Activated"
This option might become unavailable if
(1) The "Multi-Channels" is in "Encoder Mode"
(2) The "Subordinate mode" is in "External Clock Mode A"
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
需要选择 "启用"
此选项以下情况无效：
(1) "通道组合" 设置了 "编码器模式"
(2) "次定时器模式" 设置了 "外部时钟模式A"

Condition.Diagnostic:
This option might become unavailable if
(1) EXT is already used for "Enale EXT pin for output switch"
(2) The "Sub-mode input selection" is in "EXT"
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
此选项以下情况无效：
(1) EXT已经用于"开启外部输入引脚用于输出开关"
(2) "次定时器模式输入选项" 设置了 "外部输入"

Mode.Name: Enale EXT pin
Mode.UserName: Enale EXT pin for output switch
Mode.UserNameCH: 开启外部输入引脚用于输出开关

Condition.Diagnostic:
At least one channel must be set in output mode.
This option might become unavailable if
(1) EXT is already used for "Sub-mode input selection"
(2) EXT is already used as a "Clock selection"
Condition.DiagnosticCH:
需至少一个通道配置为输出模式 .
此选项以下情况无效：
(1) EXT已经用于"次定时器模式输入选项"
(2) EXT已经用于"时钟选择"

Mode.Name: Enale EXT pin
Mode.UserName: Enale EXT pin for output switch
Mode.UserNameCH: 开启外部输入引脚用于输出开关

Condition.Diagnostic: Requires Channel 1 and 2, 1 and 3 or 1 and 2 and 3 to be set as a input of "Sub-mode input selection" or in "Input direct mode"
Condition.DiagnosticCH: 通道1和2、通道1和3、通道1和2和3 作为 "次定时器模式输入选项"的输入或者处于"直接输入模式"

Condition.Diagnostic: Need to select "Activated"
Condition.DiagnosticCH: 需要选择 "启用"
